title: Ship recycling process in Bangladesh and a survey-based risk assessment with mitigation proposal

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Nafisa Mehtaj, N.M. Golam Zakaria, Zobair Ibn Awal, Shaumik Sharif Dipto, M.A. Hannan, A.K. Dev, Mir Tareque Ali
